issue.title: [Integration] Add integration test for buffer compression
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-11417](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-11417). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Buffer compression is an official feature of the IPC format but interoperability is currently untested between implementations. We should add such a test case to the integration suite.
